text: Unforgiven (2006) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) for their Raw brand. It took place on September 17, 2006 at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. It was the ninth Unforgiven event held by WWE and the first to be held outside the United States. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Super Crazy defeated Shelton Benjamin Singles match 7:00 2 Johnny Nitro (c) (with Melina) defeated Jeff Hardy Singles match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 17:36 3 Kane vs. Umaga (with Armando Alejandro Estrada) ended in a double countout Singles match 7:03 4 Spirit Squad (Kenny and Mikey) (c) (with Mitch, Johnny, and Nicky) defeated The Highlanders (Robbie and Rory McAllister) Tag team match for the World Tag Team Championship 8:59 5 D-Generation X (Triple H and Shawn Michaels) defeated Vince McMahon, Shane McMahon and The Big Show Handicap Hell in a Cell match 25:05 6 Trish Stratus defeated Lita (c) Singles match for the WWE Women's Championship 11:35 7 Randy Orton defeated Carlito Singles match 8:41 8 John Cena defeated Edge (c) (with Lita) Tables, Ladders, and Chairs match for the WWE Championship 25:28 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Unforgiven 2006 website Category:2006 in professional wrestling Category:Sport in Toronto Category:WWE Unforgiven Category:2006 in Canada Category:21st century in Toronto
title: Unforgiven (2006)
